跜字的基本解释

跜
ní
〔躨跜〕见“
躨”。

跜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ní］
［《廣韻》女夷切，平脂，娘。］
躨跜。虯龙动貌。

跜字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　跜； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1224第07
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?女夷切，音尼。【玉篇】躨跜，虯龍動貌。【李尤·辟雍賦】萬騎躨跜以攫拏。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】虯龍騰驤以蜿蟺，頷若動而躨跜。

跜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
跜字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [ní]
["Guangyun" female Yi cut, Pingzhi, mother. ]
Hesitate. The horned dragon moves its appearance.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　跜; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1224 Page 07
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Female Yi cut, sound Ni. 【Jade articles】Humming, horned dragons move their appearance. 【Li You·Piyong's Fu】Wan Qi hung around to grab it. 【Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Temple Fu】The horned dragon leaps forward to meander and curl up.
